description: Crunchy on the outside, soft and fluffy on the inside.
name: Grilled Madeira Cake with Strawberries & Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 slice Woolies madeira cake (2 cm thickness)
1 whipped cream (i use the woolies canned cream)
1 tsp icing sugar (dusted, to serve, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Into a small saucepan add the strawberries and maple syrup, bring to boil and simmer for about 5 minutes or until fruit starts to break down. Remove from heat and set aside to cool. When cooled slightly, blend with a stick blender to desired chunkiness.This can be made ahead of time and chilled in the fridge.

Heat up griddle pan on medium heat, brush both sides of the Madeira Cake with melted Butter, cook on both sides until there are lovely char marks, this should only take a couple of minutes either side.
Remove from heat to serving plates and set aside to cool.
I serve my strawberry sauce in a separate small bowl on the side, and I use the Woolies cream in a can, or you can whip your own cream if desired.
Dust over the icing sugar and sprinkle over the pistachios if using. Enjoy!
